page.title: 06THE QUEEN VISITS LOWESTOFT.
page.content: On 1ST of August the Queen Elizabeth and Prince Phillip are arriving for a visit to Lowestoft and Oulton Broad. They will be travelling along London Road North and having a luncheon at the Yacht Club. In the afternoon they will be walking about in the new shopping precinct to meet the people of Lowestoft and unveiling a plaque named after Her. Later on they will be going to Nicholas EverittÂ£s Park, in Oulton Broad, for another walk about and to open the Â£Broad House'museum. The Queen will also be watching some{ watersports which take place regularly in Oulton Broad. These include sailing, canoeing, speed-boat racing & sailboarding.
